title: Sample, 1938–39
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic yarns, metallic yarns
Technique: 2/2 twill weave
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 20 x 18.7 cm (7 7/8 x 7 3/8 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Warp is a sequence of eight purple two-ply yarns in two different thicknesses, alternating with four metallic gold wrapped yarns. Weft is turquoise cotton chenille.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, 1938–39.
1938–39. Medium: cotton, synthetic yarns, metallic yarns
